item.title: Cafédirect introduces Cauca Terroir Roast & Ground Coffee in Singapore
item.description:
According to Cafédirect, their Cauca Terroir Roast & Ground Coffee pairs well with sweet and fruity flavors. Ideal pairings in Colombia include pan de queso (cheese bread) and alfajores (caramel cookie sandwiches). “Terroir” encapsulates the unique environmental and geographic factors of a region that influence a beverage’s taste. Cafédirect recently introduced their Cauca Terroir Roast & Ground Coffee to Singapore. Colombians describe this high-altitude coffee as “black as night, hot as hell and sweet as love”...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/caf-direct-introduces-cauca-terroir-roast-ground-coffee-in-singapore/

item.title: Hotels.com provides exclusive information on transportation options to and from the airport
item.description:
Hotels.com, a website for booking accommodations online, has put together an insider’s guide on the top transportation choices from 29 major airports globally. This guide, called the Hotels.com Airport Transportation Insider, compares taxis, private cars, and public transportation in popular international and domestic destinations using data from the recent Hotel Price Index™. Although it’s geared towards US travelers, the infographic provides helpful information for cities like Bangkok, Beijing, Singapore, and Sydney...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hotels-com-provides-exclusive-information-on-transportation-options-to-and-from-the-airport/
